snippet: Moelis & Company, the boutique investment bank founded by Kenneth D. Moelis, has begun working with advisers on a potential initial public offering, people briefed on the matter said on Friday.
abstract: Moelis & Company, the boutique investment bank founded by Kenneth D. Moelis, has begun working with advisers on a potential initial public offering, people briefed on the matter said on Friday.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and DAVID GELLES

headline.main: Moelis Is Said to Ready a Potential Public Offering
headline.print_headline: Boutique Investment Bank Is Said to Prepare for I.P.O.
